text: Ndi okhawo amene ali ndi chikhulupiriro, amene amakhulupirira mwa Mulungu ndi Mtumwi wake ndipo amati akasonkhana pamodzi ndi iye pa zinthu zofunika sachoka mpaka pamene apempha chilolezo chake. Ndithudi anthu amene amakupempha chilolezo ndiwo amene amakhulupirira mwa Mulungu ndi Mtumwi wake. Pamene akupempha iwe chilolezo choti achoke ndi cholinga chokagwira ntchito zawo, pereka chilolezo kwa aliyense amene iwe wamufuna ndipo mumupemphe Mulungu kuti awakhululukire machimo awo. Mulungu amakhululukira ndipo ndi wachisoni chosatha
